mapper.select: SELECT r_code, id, rev_code, f_code, r_w_date, r_content, r_star, r_declaration, r_lockpwd FROM review order by r_w_date DESC

select cam.cam_name, cam.cam_code from camping cam join (select c.cam_code from reservation r join camping_rev_info c on r.cri_area_code = c.cri_area_code where r.rev_code = #{rev_code})as j on cam.cam_code = j.cam_code
mapper.insert: insert into review(r_code, id, rev_code, r_w_date, r_content, r_star, r_declaration, r_lockpwd) values (#{r_code},#{id},#{rev_code},now(),#{r_content},#{r_star},#{r_declaration},#{r_lockpwd})
mapper.select: select COUNT(cam.cam_code) from camping_rev_info cam JOIN (SELECT rev.cri_area_code FROM review r INNER JOIN reservation rev ON r.rev_code=rev.rev_code) j ON cam.cri_area_code=j.cri_area_code where cam.cam_code=#{cam_code}

select id, r_w_date, r_content, r_star, r_declaration from review r join (select re.rev_code from camping_rev_info ci join reservation re on ci.cri_area_code = re.cri_area_code where ci.cam_code = #{cam_code}) j on r.rev_code = j.rev_code
